description: The Output & Workflow Orchestrator acts as the application's control center: it starts from the CLI entry point, sequences analysis steps, coordinates diagram and documentation generation, and prepares serialized analysis data for output generators. The main flow is: the CLI initializes context and invokes the workflow orchestrator, which requests structured analysis data (via the serializer) and then triggers the diagram generator and documentation renderer to produce final visual and textual outputs.

components.name: CLI & Workflow Orchestrator
components.description: Serves as the application's main entry point; parses CLI args, initializes context, and orchestrates the high-level workflow by invoking analysis and output generation processes.

components.name: Diagram Generation Manager
components.description: Manages generation of architectural diagrams from structured code analysis results, retrieving insights from the analysis layer and rendering visual representations.

components.name: Documentation Output Renderer
components.description: Transforms structured analysis data into human-readable documentation formats (e.g., Markdown, HTML) using templates and formatting rules.

components.name: Analysis Data Serializer
components.description: Serializes and deserializes structured analysis results into a standardized format (e.g., JSON) so diagram and documentation generators can consume consistent input.
